text: Yes or No? is a 1920 American drama movie. It was directed by Roy William Neill. The movie is based on the play of the same name by Arthur Goodrich. It stars Norma Talmadge, Natalie Talmadge, Frederick Burton, Lowell Sherman, and Gladden James. It was distributed by First National Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1920 drama movies Category:1920s American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Roy William Neill
title: Yes or No?
